Control.Name: TextBox5
Control.Tag: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <ActiveReportTag xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <ValueFormula>((_currentRow.DebetCurrencyID.Value != (int) PredefinedCurrencies.Rouble && _currentRow.CreditCurrencyID.Value != (int) PredefinedCurrencies.Rouble && _currentRow.DebetIsClient2360Y.Value == 1) || _currentRow.DebetCurrencyID.Value == _currentRow.CreditCurrencyID.Value) ? (Currency.GetSumAsCentralBankNumeric(_currentRow.RoubleEquivalentSum.Value) + " " + Currency.GetCurrencyByID((int) PredefinedCurrencies.Rouble).NameISO) : (Currency.GetSumAsCentralBankNumeric(_currentRow.DebetSum.Value) + " " + Currency.GetCurrencyByID(_currentRow.DebetCurrencyID.Value).NameISO)</ValueFormula> <VisibilityFormula>_currentRow.DebetCurrencyID.Value != (int) PredefinedCurrencies.Rouble && _currentRow.CreditCurrencyID.Value != (int) PredefinedCurrencies.Rouble || (_currentRow.CreditIsClient2360Y.Value == 1 && _currentRow.DebetCurrencyID.Value != _currentRow.CreditCurrencyID.Value)</VisibilityFormula> <Comment /> </ActiveReportTag>
